tree.name: Isaiah Jackson
tree.tradeDescription: Traded from Pacers with Bennedict Mathurin, a protected 2026 1st and an unprotected 2029 1st for Ivica Zubac and Kobe Brown
tree.note: Kentucky big man with shot-blocking ability

assetsGivenUp.name: Ivica Zubac
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Traded from Lakers with Michael Beasley for Mike Muscala

assetsGivenUp.name: Kobe Brown
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted by Clippers 30th overall in 2023 (pick acquired from HOU via MEM trade)
